### *Welcome to my online CV* {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}


#### What this webpage is about {.tabset}
* With this webpage I would like to express my sincere interest in the position as a **working student** in the      department **market analytics** at Sony Music. Here I have provided everything for you in order to get to know me   a little better and get an idea what my motivation is. You can find out where my passion for data science      derives from and what made me aspire to become to a Data Scientist. If you would like to jump directly to a    quick overview, click <a href="https://fabio-auerswald.github.io/Resume.html "rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_parent">here</a>.

#### What can be found on this webpage {.tabset}
* A Resume, with detailed information about my education, work experience and further skills
* A section with more details and an introduction
* References to my musical activities
* Contact info


#### How this webpage was created {.tabset}
* This webpage was build with RStudio using the documentation tool RMarkdown including html, css and Github      Pages for publishing it on the web.
